::Dollen::

           Dollen laughed for a moment.

            "I'd love to fly it!!  I could tackle one of these anyday!!!!"
He laughed some more, "I used to be a pilot!" He said and motioned his hands
toward the pod.

             "Ladies first," He said, smiling.
